name: The Holy Soup Crusader
description:
Go on an adventure of a lifetime! explore andy warhols cupboard stuffed full of brillo and find the fabled holy soup of cambell.

But its dangous to go alone, find friends along the way and with the power of friendship defaul the evil soup king

- UP  is Foward
- LEFT, RIGHT, DOWN change your direction

This is an old style dungeon crawler, where you make your own map! (maybe with https://jspaint.app/) there are landmarks you can record to help you

There are hidden andy warhol references throughout, comment if you found them!

(⇀‸↼‶) Might be some bugs in the battle system, try just slowing down and not rushing :)
